name: Continental Explorer: Liyue
description: Light up the entire Liyue map.

name: Surveyor of Stone
description: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Liyue.

name: Unmovable Mountain
description: Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Liyue to their maximum level.

name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Liyue
description: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in Liyue.

name: Lithic Guide
description: Follow %var% Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts.

name: Rock-Steady Adventurer
description: Complete %var% Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Liyue.
